More than Rs.10 to 30 Crores 25 16 3 More than Rs.30 to 60 Crores 40 30 4 More than Rs.60 Crores 60 50 Note: 1) *In Col.4, to arrive at number in case of JVI Association in ongoing assignments, the consultancy fee shared will be considered, if the share of a consultancy firm is 25% in any assignment; it would be counted as 0.25. 2) Conditions in both Col.2 & Col.3 are to be fulfilled to claim maximum no. of projects given in Col.4. ii) The consulting firms should be encouraged to carry out a mix of DPR and Supervision Assignments like IEIAE/ Supervision Consultants (SC): Out of maximum number of projects given at Col.4 above, the ceiling for IEJAEISC assignments is 75%. For example; the Consulting Firm at Sr. No. 1 can get maximum 6 number of IEJAEISC assignments only, whereas they can 8 DPR assignments with 'Nil' IEIAEISC assignments: The Financial Proposal of the Consulting Firm crossing the upper ceiling of assignments as at Col.4 above shall not be opened: (iii) The assignments where provisional completion of civil work was over would be considered as completed, unless there is specific default of the consulting firm. The firm shall give an undertaking in this regard. (iv) For the purpose of calculation of maximum no. of projects in Col.4, the work awarded and in progress will be taken into consideration as utilized capacity: (v) Special Projects like tunnel, stand-alone bridge and emergency landing facility shall be exempted from the above criteria.
